body: Plasma oscillations; collisional phenomena; transport properties; orbit theory; typical electric discharge phenomena.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 330 or PHYS 467)(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: AERSP 490, NUCE 490)

title: EE 471: Introduction to Plasmas
